- PC with dual monitors
- ICOM SM-30 desk mic
- Footswitch

## {background-iframe="https://nittany-amateur-radio-club.github.io/field-day/"}

---

- Saturday, June 22 - Sunday, June 23 (2:00 PM EDT - 2:00 PM EDT)
- NARC Clubhouse
  - Class 2 (transmitters) D (Delta), [home/permanent station on mains power](http://www.arrl.org/field-day-rules) 
  - 100 W max
  - W3YA callsign
- Dedicated (bonus) VHF+ station (W3SWL)
- Food & drink

## New this year

- Field/portable station at Jo Hays Vista
  - Sat 2p-5p; Sun 11p-2p
  - Either 1A (W3GA) or alternative transmitter for W3YA
  - FM + linear satellite set-up?
  - Get on the air (GOTA) station?
- Inviting 2m and 70cm simplex QSOs from MS 150 operators or others in the valley

---

- Rotating Yagis!
  - [Green Heron rotator controllers](https://www.greenheronengineering.com/product/rotator-controller-rt-21/) for Mosely antennas (20m-10m)
  - *Coming soon*: Control rotators from NARC1 and NARC2 (thanks, K0LO)
- New logging software ([ACLog](https://www.n3fjp.com/aclog.html) by N3FJP)
  - N3LI spearheading
- New [Halibut Electronics audio interface ](https://electronics.halibut.com/product-category/ham/hhi) for NARC1
